name: veracode-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Veracode API integration to access application details and scan results

scripts.example:sca-results: npm run build && echo "Usage: node examples/get-sca-results.js <app-name>" && echo "Example: node examples/get-sca-results.js \"YourAppName\""
scripts.example:get-static-flaw-info: npm run build && echo "Usage: node examples/get-static-flaw-info.js <app_id> <flaw_id>" && echo "Example: node examples/get-static-flaw-info.js your-app-id 123"
scripts.example:compare-analysis: npm run build && echo "Usage: node examples/compare-analysis-approaches.js <app_name> <flaw_id>" && echo "Example: node examples/compare-analysis-approaches.js \"MyApp\" 123"

author: Dipsylala
